headline: WK Kellogg (KLG) Skyrockets 30.6% as Ferrero Gobbles Up Stake
summary: WK Kellogg Co (NYSE:KLG) is one of the stocks that are flying past expectations. WK Kellogg rose for a second day on Thursday, soaring 30.63 percent to end at $22.86 apiece following news that it was set to be acquired by The Ferrero Group for $3.1 billion. In a statement, WK Kellogg Co (NYSE:KLG) said it entered […]
